explains: n. 小球；[军]小子弹（枪用）；（生科）沉淀物
vt. 将……制成丸状；用子弹打；用小球扔
n. （Pellet）人名；（西）佩列特；（法）佩莱；（德）佩勒特
wordGroup: pellet mill 制粒设备；制片机；制丸磨；饲料压粒机

sentences.en: A centrifuge separates the fat cells from the stem and regenerative cells, concentrating them into a pellet, which is then extracted.
sentences.cn: 离心机将脂肪细胞从干细胞和再生细胞中分离出来，将它们浓缩成一个小球，再萃取出来。

sentences.en: It was embedded in the frounce pellet.
sentences.cn: 它被嵌入在起皱的小球中。

sentences.en: The configuration, performance and combination mode of DFZL pellet crumbler are introduced.
sentences.cn: 介绍了 DFZL 型颗粒破碎机的结构、性能及组合方式。
